text: my name is Drew Pinsky and I've been to
153 countries since 2012
my number one goal is to inspire you to
get out there and see the world I first
got the travel bug from studying abroad
in Prague then taught English in South
Korea for two years and now I'm closing
in on my goal to visit every country in
the world on my channel you will find
daily travel videos sharing i opening
stories about people places culture and
any other thing i find interesting
on the road you will also discover
plenty of travel tips hacks and advice I
invite you to hit that subscribe button
and follow my journey as I take you to
unfamiliar places to meet with
unfamiliar people eat their home cooked
foods and dive into their traditions I
will show you the good the bad the
beautiful and everything in between on
this wonderful planet we call earth
thanks for watching my videos and please
drop me a line to ask any questions or
simply say hi I have 40 countries left
until I finished the whole world it's
gonna be really intense really exciting
hit that subscribe button and join me
for some awesome travel content
